experience.clearmix.achievement1: Frontend lead for ClearMix Logistics platform. Planned and engineered a scheduling app where the user can schedule a recording time and select a location to receive a studio-in-a-box. This is a NextJs project which was handled with an integration of the Google Maps API.
experience.clearmix.achievement2: Architected, developed, and maintained ClearMix's flagship virtual studio application, facilitating remote communication and high-quality video recordings stored locally and uploaded to the cloud in real-time ‚Äì lowering internal costs and increasing the company's quarter-over-quarter revenue.

experience.clearmix.achievement4: Participated in routine peer reviews to advocate for consistent code quality spanning the stack. Wrote and maintained unit tests for frontend functionality across the platform.

caseStudies.nx.title: Nx Monorepo: Architecture & Codebase Audit
caseStudies.nx.subtitle: Led comprehensive analysis and modernization of enterprise-scale monorepo infrastructure.
caseStudies.nx.problem: Legacy structure with 200+ projects, inconsistent patterns, circular dependencies
caseStudies.nx.actions: Conducted full architectural audit, defined migration strategy, established governance
caseStudies.nx.impact: 50% faster builds, improved DX, scalable foundation for 20+ developers
caseStudies.charts.title: Charts & Haptics Stabilization
caseStudies.charts.subtitle: Resolved critical performance bottlenecks in real-time data visualization components.
caseStudies.charts.problem: Chart library causing crashes, memory leaks, and poor mobile UX
caseStudies.charts.actions: Profiled performance, optimized rendering, implemented haptic feedback system
caseStudies.charts.impact: Zero crashes, 60fps on mobile, improved user satisfaction scores
caseStudies.modal.contextText: I conducted a full audit of a shared Nx monorepo containing multiple React web and mobile apps. The goal was to identify architectural inconsistencies, reduce duplication, and define scalable standards for reusability and type safety across teams.
caseStudies.modal.takeawayText: This audit reinforced the value of architectural clarity and team alignment in multi-platform environments. Good code structure isn't just about components ‚Äî it's about communication, consistency, and enabling every developer to work with confidence and speed.
